mapper.update: update tbl_logs set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ope_action = #{opeAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ope_entity = #{opeEntity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ope_detail = #{opeDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, time, admin_id, ope_action, ope_entity, ope_detail from tbl_logs
